experiment.name: Do vs dont formulation tweet sentiment analysis

correct_samples.sample: @united 5 gate changes, two delays.  Even the crew thinks the airline sucks
correct_samples.label: Negative

correct_samples.sample: @SouthwestAir could care more about their customer, if there is a reasonable request :(
correct_samples.label: Negative

correct_samples.sample: @JetBlue Sure did go south after breakfast though! Delayed three hours. :( :( :(
correct_samples.label: Negative

correct_samples.sample: @AmericanAir That’s a rather clunky process. Whoever designed that clearly doesn’t understand e-mail 101.
correct_samples.label: Negative

correct_samples.sample: @AmericanAir I can't!!!  No one can't get to "hold".  You can't get past the automated reply.  It hangs up on you.  #FRUSTRATED
correct_samples.label: Negative

incorrect_samples.sample: @SouthwestAir aren't you based in Chicago? Why are you doing a hunt in LA and not your home city????!! Please bring one home
incorrect_samples.label: Neutral

incorrect_samples.sample: @AmericanAir My ticket was booked with AA with miles..... Sorry we sold you a ticket with a company we merged with but we can't fix it?
incorrect_samples.label: Negative

invalid_samples.sample: @AmericanAir I'd love to take my seat, but it appears as though someone already has.  #disappointed #upgrademe #wtf http://t.co/9Gx5mMmubb
invalid_samples.label: Negative
